laboratory_examinations.findings: Moderate-sized bilateral pleural effusions; adjacent lung base consolidation consistent with atelectasis. Liver, gallbladder, bile ducts, pancreas, spleen, adrenal glands, kidneys, and ureters normal. Irregular fluid-density collection in the right lower quadrant measuring 2.8 x 1.6 x 2.3 cm, increased size and development of enhancing walls since prior exam. Mild cecal inflammation with moderate adjacent soft tissue stranding. Several prominent mesenteric nodes likely reactive.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Interval increase in size of the irregular fluid-density collection and development of enhancing walls noted since prior exam.
